entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 7:29 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:29 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the evening and ending near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 7:29 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
